example.text: The Biden administration's open-border policies have led us to the crisis we are seeing today. This week, [[user]] will vote on the Secure The Border Act to do just that -- secure our borders! [[url]]

Major Childhood Cancer Prevention Legislation was signed into law! The STAR (Survivorship, Treatment, Access, and Research) Reauthorization Act -- a bill I led with Reps. Michael McCaul (R-Texas), G K Butterfield (D-NC), and Jackie Speier (D-Calif.)

Today, I'm announcing my 2024 Community Project Funding requests. My team and I selected these projects because they give taxpayers the greatest return on their investment. We are delivering results for Western Pennsylvania! Full list?? [[url]]
What a weird name to be used in Washington. I wish we could stop playing this game of who struck John.

Today, I introduced legislation to rename US Route 20 "The National Medal of Honor Highway." US Route 20 is the longest highway in the US and stretches coast-to-coast. This honors the members of our Armed Forces who have received our nation's highest military decoration. [[url]]

The bill prohibits the sale and export of crude oil from the United States Strategic Petroleum Reserve (SPR) to any entity which is under the ownership, control, or influence of the Chinese Communist Party (CCP). Further, the bill requires that the Department of Energy require as a condition of any sale of crude oil from the SPR, that such oil not be exported to China.
